title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - The long awaited George Kambosos vs. Teofimo Lopez
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - The long awaited George Kambosos vs. Teofimo Lopez
description:
Chris sits down with Joe Markowski, the EVP at DAZN to talk about the business of boxing, how 2021 and COVID have affected DAZN, and what the future of boxing looks like for the company. Later, George Kambosos stops by to talk about his preparation for his upcoming fight with Teofimo Lopez that was supposed to happen in June, and why there is so much bad blood between the two camps.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
